tag_list: entrepreneur, geolocation, microlisting, alternative, currency, crowdsourcing, crowdfunding, classifieds, real-time
overview:
Founder of an online start-up Kolektywa, which is a community integration platform for knowledge & service exchange, that facilitates location based micro-listing, project crowd-funding and complementary currency. The idea was evaluated when she created her first business plan for her MBA class in 2008. She works as an Digital marketing strategist and small business consultant since 2006. She is also psychology post-bacc student.

http://about.me/karinakoloch
